reviewText: The TV coverage is great and the background indepth study is very informative. Would like to have seen more crowd coverage.
Really good dvd with a really full and intense overview of the whole event.

What can you say, it's the Tour de France.

Over the years they've pretty much gotten the coverage methodology down well enough. There are some stages I'd like to have seen more of. The breakaways on the flat stages where the young guys are let loose to fly instead of break the air for their team leaders. But it would add a lot of time that wouldn't add anything to the results.
This is a great tour! My sweetie has already watched it 5 times and my mom is just getting underway--great holiday gifts!
